description:
Kenshiro and Kaioh`s deadly struggle continues. But Kenshiro is put in dire peril when his body becomes paralyzed by gas in a cave beneath the Swamp of Demon. Meanwhile, learning of the destructive point hit on Lin, the Asuras go after her. Danger draws closer and closer to Lin as she begins to regain consciousness. Will Hyoh make it in time!? In the midst of battle, Kenshiro learns that Kaioh also bears the blood of the main family of the North Star. There is a story behind that, a tragic tale about the main family of the North Star from before the Divine Fist of the North Star was founded...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Plus que trois épisodes ! L`histoire sanglante du Hokuto dure depuis plus de 2 000 ans !!
The Final Chapter: The Last Three Episodes! Here Is the 2,000 Year-Old History of the Main Family of the North Star!!
最終章 残り3回! これが北斗宗家2000年の血の歴史!!
